Title: WPF Twitter Viewer
Description:
WPF Twitter is a free Twitter client. This is the initial version that serves more as scaffolding then the final application.

Please feel free to use this and extend it as you want.
HomeWiki:
Project updated to new version and moved to http://code.google.com/p/wittytwitter/.
